attributes.action: scrap Pelican (and similar) Crossings in favour of footbridges over town centre and major carriageways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keeping traffic and pedestrians apart has got to be a wise move.  Footbridges will create employment opportunities and are more cost effective.  Traffic will flow far more smoothly and efficiently, rather than the current stop/start journeys we are sick and tired of.
